actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, to delete the requirement that Congress authorize amounts of special nuclear material which may be distributed to a group of nations.

summary.text: Removes the requirement that Congress authorize amounts over and above the amounts authorized by the Atomic Energy Act to be granted without the approval of Congress of special nuclear material which may be distributed to a group of nations or to the International Atomic Energy Agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, to delete the requirement that Congress authorize amounts of special nuclear material which may be distributed to a group of nations.
